title: "Reconnect to game"
body:
I just finished a normal game, after my game I waited 5 minutes until I then 'skip stats' after I had done that my screen went black. I then closed and reopened league and it told me to 'reconnect to game' when I was not in one, I clicked it anyways and then the game kept crashing so I restarted my comp, restarted my modem and it still isn't working and continually doing the same thing over and over again. I have gone through this process many times. Can someone please help me, I would like to play. 

Thank you.

replies.body: It sounds like what you experienced was what we refer to as a "ghost game". This typically happens when the game server didn't properly send the signal that the match was over and results were recorded. It generally won't last more than a few hours at most, but please let me know if you're still seeing this issue.
